killicon.Add.description:
KILLICON [Client] Creates new kill icon using a texture.

[string] class
  Weapon or entity class

[string] texture
  Path to the texture

[table] color
  Color of the kill icon

killicon.AddAlias.description:
KILLICON [Client] Creates kill icon from existing one.

[string] new_class
  New class of the kill icon

[string] existing_class
  Already existing kill icon class

killicon.AddFont.description:
KILLICON [Client] Adds kill icon for given weapon/entity class using special font.

[string] class
  Weapon or entity class

[string] font
  Font to be used

[string] symbol
  The symbol to be used

[table] color
  Color of the killicon

killicon.Draw.description:
KILLICON [Client] Draws a kill icon.

[number] x
  X coordinate of the icon

[number] y
  Y coordinate of the icon

[string] name
  Classname of the kill icon

[number] alpha
  Alpha/transparency value ( 0 - 255 ) of the icon

killicon.Exists.description:
KILLICON [Client] 

[string] class
  The class to test

killicon.GetSize.description:
KILLICON [Client] Returns the size of a kill icon.

[string] name
  Classname of the kill icon
